sentence.text: The zinc transporter cellular response to zinc ion starvation influences epithelial cell morphology and migration in various cancers; however, its role in regulating cell invasion and chemotherapeutic resistance in human lung cancer is not yet clear.

entity.text: cellular response to zinc ion starvation

sentence.text: Here, integrated analysis of gene expression in non-small cell lung cancer revealed that cellular response to zinc ion starvation expression is significantly correlated with increased tumour size and regional lymph node spread, as well as shorter overall survival (OS) and disease-free survival (DFS).

entity.text: cellular response to zinc ion starvation

sentence.text: cellular response to zinc ion starvation silencing by lentivirus-mediated shRNA blocked human lung cancer cell epithelial-mesenchymal transition and metastasis in vitro and in vivo, respectively.

entity.text: cellular response to zinc ion starvation

sentence.text: Moreover, cellular response to zinc ion starvation knockdown enhanced cancer cell sensitivity to cisplatin-induced death by inhibiting stemness in lung cancer cells.

entity.text: cellular response to zinc ion starvation

sentence.text: Collectively, these data suggest that cellular response to zinc ion starvation may be a novel therapeutic target and predictive marker of tumour metastasis in non-small cell lung cancer

entity.text: cellular response to zinc ion starvation
